title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\StudySpec
name: StudySpec
description:
Represents specification of a Study.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.StudySpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.decay_curve_stopping_spec
params.description: The automated early stopping spec using decay curve rule.

params.name: data.median_automated_stopping_spec
params.description: The automated early stopping spec using median rule.

params.name: data.convex_automated_stopping_spec
params.description: The automated early stopping spec using convex stopping rule.

params.name: data.parameters
params.description: Required. The set of parameters to tune.

params.name: data.algorithm
params.description: The search algorithm specified for the Study.

params.name: data.observation_noise
params.description: The observation noise level of the study. Currently only supported by the Vertex AI Vizier service. Not supported by HyperparameterTuningJob or TrainingPipeline.

params.name: data.measurement_selection_type
params.description: Describe which measurement selection type will be used
